definitions.definition: A former custom of Eton schoolboys to go to a hill on the Bath road every third Whit Tuesday to demand ' salt -money' from passers-by, for the university expenses of the senior scholar or school captain .

main_definition: ( UK , historical ) A former custom of Eton schoolboys to go to a hill on the Bath road every third Whit Tuesday to demand ' salt -money' from passers-by, for the university expenses of the senior scholar or school captain .
